response.overview: Set in Stalin-era Soviet Union, a disgraced MGB agent is dispatched to investigate a series of child murders -- a case that begins to connect with the very top of party leadership.
response.tagline: How do you find a killer who doesn’t exist?
response.title: Child 44

titles.title: チャイルド44 森に消えた子供たち
失控獵殺 ： 第 44 個孩子
